channel.title: Posts on My Tech Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My Tech Blog

item.title: My First Post
item.description: I wanted to create a tech blog, where I could make posts, and I figured why not on GitHub? After searching around, I decided on using Hugo for it, and started with this guide, and stumbled around on the internet to figure out the rest. This is less of a “howto” and more of a window into a “howdid;” there’s a ton of links at the end where you can find well-organized instructions.
